title: France
description: In August 2011 my family took a trip to France. Mostly Paris, but we also went to the southern coast.

photos.description: The lower half of the Eiffel tower and an orange balloon. I like this picture a lot.
Some pigeons on a bird statue.
Notre Dame, carefully angled to avoid as much of the throng below as I could.
Versaille, again carefully framed to appear less zoo-like.
Some fountains in the gardens of Versaille.
Stained glass and a cool statue silhouette in Notre Dame.
A rainbow reflected in a glass door. I have a couple of it near the Eiffel tower too, but it was gray and rainy so they're not that great.
A pier and beach and lighthouse somewhere in the south of France.
